de.tum.in.tumcampus.tumonline

Class TUMOnlineRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.tumonline.TUMOnlineRequest

  • public class TUMOnlineRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will handle all action needed to communicate with the TUMOnline XML-RPC backend. ALl communications is based on the base-url which is attached by the Token and additional parameters.

      Fetches the result of the HTTPRequest (which can be seen by using getRequestURL())
      void fetchInteractive(android.content.Context context, TUMOnlineRequestFetchListener listener)
      this fetch method will fetch the data from the TUMOnline Request and will address the listeners onFetch if the fetch succeeded, else the onFetchError will be called

    • Method Detail

      • cancelRequest

        public void cancelRequest(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)

      • fetch

        public java.lang.String fetch()
        Fetches the result of the HTTPRequest (which can be seen by using getRequestURL())
        Returns:
        output will be a raw String

      • fetchInteractive

        public void fetchInteractive(android.content.Context context,
                    TUMOnlineRequestFetchListener listener)
        this fetch method will fetch the data from the TUMOnline Request and will address the listeners onFetch if the fetch succeeded, else the onFetchError will be called
        Parameters:
        context - the current context (may provide the current activity)
        listener - the listener, which takes the result

      • getRequestURL

        java.lang.String getRequestURL()
        This will return the URL to the TUMOnlineRequest with regard to the set parameters
        Returns:
        a String URL

      • resetParameters

        void resetParameters()
        Reset parameters to an empty Map

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String value)
        Sets one parameter name to its given value
        Parameters:
        name - identifier of the parameter
        value - value of the parameter
